Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Minor
b) Defect Observed: Fuel pump bearing wear beyond limits. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Inadequate maintenance procedure resulting in improper installation
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Flight Control component. Functional
testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
c) Remedial Measures Implement enhanced testing protocol before component installation
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Reduce inspection interval for affected component type
d) Attributable Code: N1 - Defect confirmed but reason not established
Remarks: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent.
Date: 04/09/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai
